message: Starting schema design: reading codebase to understand current implementation
Analyzed existing code patterns. Designing conversation_history schema with intelligent truncation algorithm
Schema document created. Reporting comprehensive findings with integration details

Schema design completed. Delivered 760-line CONVERSATION_HISTORY_SCHEMA.md with complete specification: parameter schema, intelligent asymmetric truncation algorithm, validation rules, prompt formatting, integration points, test requirements, performance analysis, and future enhancement roadmap
